price: Ka sε: “Monante (anaasε montu kwan) wͻ asaase no so na monhwε sεdeε wͻn a wͻ’poo nokorε no awieε si wieε “.
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi thumma unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
